title: Online Payments & Service Requests, Walk-in Closets
posting_body: Now offering social distance and virtual touring options!
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.
Embrace the signature SkyView Apartment Homes lifestyle!
With charming interiors, resort-inspired amenities, and an unbeatable location close to everything you want, our apartments in Westminster, CO, are a whole new definition of luxury living.
For more information on our splendid Westminster apartments in Colorado, give us a call or book a personal tour today!

Shared Patio/Balcony Space, Ceiling Fans*, Walk-in Closets, Modern Cherry or White Cabinetry, Stainless Steel or Black Appliance Package, Granite-inspired Countertops, Brushed Nickel Lighting & Hardware, Stackable Washer / Dryer Included, Vaulted Ceilings*, Energy Efficient Air-Conditioning, Plank Flooring Throughout Home, Fireplace

In Ground Hot Tub, Reserved Parking, Relaxing Saltwater Pool, Outdoor Kitchen & Firepit, 24/7 Fitness Center, Resident Clubhouse with WiFi cafe, 24-hour Emergency Maintenance, Online Payments & Service Requests, Scenic Views
